participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted and imaginative, often lost in the worlds of fantasy and creativity.
participant_1.background: i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, always seeking new experiences and sharing thoughts through poetry.
participant_2.background: i'm a huge star wars fan. i try various coffees as a hobby. i enjoy poetry. i played football for a division a college.

content.text: that s always fun i play video games to keep my life interesting
